post.body: My daughter is just starting her two weeks of Christmas vacation. My days are already a blur and this won't help.
That's how they get ya.
THE ROAD by Cormac McCarthy
What do you mean? The week's just started! ;)
Man, I wanna see Slumdog Millionaire.
Yes! Then I hear folks who are PRO-gay marriage talk marriage up as if the Christians invented it. Spoiler: They didn't.
Company protocol is to drop the boxes on the stoop and not tell anyone? Weird.
Oh blah. That won't make me miss the cling, I assure you. No more than the cling makes me miss the "scream all day" phase.
They didn't let me know. I heard them drop the packages on the stoop.
Ringing a doorbell while a baby is sleeping should be a crime.
Were there scary nurses?
I didn't with the girl and I doubt I will with the boy. Attention, good. Cling, notsogood.
Oy. Up. Boy slept in ergo I slept in. Which is good cuz I needed it. Coffee's on and oven's heating up. Biscuits this morning, yo.
CNN headline: Andrew Jackson: Great leader or angry hick? That's the difference between Jackson and Bush. With Bush, there's no question.
Where the hell did the extremely misguided notion that marriage is a religious institution come from?
I feel stomach sick, am getting a head cold, and am staring at inches of freshly fallen snow that needs cleared. Hey, winter: Yo mama.
Past couple years I haven't liked any eggnog I've bought in Wisconsin. This year, I found some good stuff.
We went out to eat. Mexican. The place with the good food and the bad service. The _great_ food actually. And the bad service.
Ah, the old "I'm putting these packages in front of your door so you have to go through your garage to get them" trick.
Ah, the old "I sent you an IM telling you I sent you an email " trick.
